snippet: Expectations for stimulus in Europe and the United States led to recent gains, but investors found little reason to keep pushing stocks up.
abstract: Stocks rise for a fourth day in a thinly traded session, as investors are cautious.
lead_paragraph: Expectations for stimulus in Europe and the United States led to recent gains, but investors found little reason to keep pushing stocks up.

headline.seo: Dow Rises for 4th Day, Though Investors Grow Cautious
headline.main: Dow Rises for a 4th Day, but Investors Are Cautious
headline.print_headline: Dow Rises for a 4th Day, But Investors Are Cautious
